item.title: Ubuntu Server Configuration
item.author: kunal.sumbly@gmail.com (Kunal Sumbly)
item.description: Below is a listing of important tasks to complete after spinning up your Ubuntu server. SSH login as root You should have added an ssh key to the instance during creation. SSH into the instance as root with ssh root@server_ip_address Update server to latest patches sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get upgrade Optionally to uninstall old packages sudo apt-get autoremove Create a new user adduser user_name Assign root permission to new user gpasswd -a user_name sudo
